name: Lance Williams
content: Lance Williams's Home Page Lance R. Williams Associate Professor Dept. of Computer Science School of Engineering University of New Mexico Albuquerque, NM 87131 williams@cs.unm.edu Phone: (505) 277-3914 Fax: (505) 277-6927 Lance R. Williams received the BS degree in computer science from the Pennsylvania State University and the MS and PhD degrees in computer science from the University of Massachusetts. Prior to joining UNM, he was a post-doctoral scientist at NEC Research Institute. Teaching CS 357 CS 422 CS 491 CS 530 CS 591 Research computer vision and graphics neural computation digital image processing Selected Publications Graduate Students Dissertation Motto "Eppur si muove!"
